title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A leader's guide to AI-powered FinOps (SNR306)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI驱动的FinOps领导者指南 (SNR306)
abstract: The convergence of FinOps principles and generative AI is providing  organizations new ways they better manage cloud spending and investment strategises.  This session will discuss how organizations  are  successfully  deploying  generative AI to automate anomaly detection, enhance resource allocation, and convert complex cloud financial data into actionable insights. Attendees will learn practical strategies for implementing AI-driven FinOps practices, measuring ROI on generative AI investments, and developing a comprehensive roadmap for intelligent cloud cost management.
abstract_cn: FinOps原则与生成式AI的融合为组织提供了更好地管理云支出和投资策略的新方法。本次会议将讨论组织如何成功部署生成式AI来自动化异常检测、增强资源分配，并将复杂的云财务数据转化为可操作的洞察。与会者将学习实施AI驱动的FinOps实践的实用策略、衡量生成式AI投资的投资回报率，以及制定智能云成本管理的综合路线图。
